1. City Hall

City Hall
=========

![image_access_800](https://www.elizabethnj.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4298)


The City government of Elizabeth, New Jersey is made up of a
[Mayor](https://www.elizabethnj.org/271/Our-Mayor)
and a
[City Council](https://www.elizabethnj.org/215/City-Council)
. The City's Mayor J. Christian Bollwage, a lifelong resident of Elizabeth, is currently serving his sixth term as Mayor. The Elizabeth City Council is made up of nine members.

1. #### [City Council](https://www.elizabethnj.org/215/City-Council)

   Take a look at City Council information for the City of Elizabeth.
2. The Department of Health and Human Services consists of seven (7) divisions, Animal Control, Health Division, Health and Housing, Human Services, Reentry, Transportation, and Vital Statistics. Under Human Services there are six (6) subdivision, Elizabeth Municipal Alliance Committee, City of Elizabeth Rental Assistance Program, Office on Aging, Office of Public Health, Office on Youth, and Public Health Nursing.
3. #### [City Ordinances](https://www.elizabethnj.org/272/City-Ordinances)

   View the City of Elizabeth City Ordinances.
4. #### [City Council Resolutions](https://www.elizabethnj.org/790/City-Council-Resolutions)
